ideas.name: Create an alert exception command for XDR integration

description.body: Some analysts needs to add regularly alerts exception in XDR, based on CGO for the behavioral threat protection module. It should be nice if we could do that with a command in XSOAR with the Palo Alto Networks Cortex XDR - Investigation and Response integration.

ideas.name: Adding MFA feature on local admin account. only

description.body:
Hello,

We would like to see a new feature in order to enforce security on the default full admin account.

We enforced SSO on our platform and the last account to secure is the default one and for now, it is not possible to enforce MFA only on it.

The idea would be to allow the possibility to use any MFA solution like Microsoft Authenticator or Google Authenticator, and to select on which account it needs to be applied.

ideas.name: Ability to amend the color of the favicons

description.body: Ability to amend the color of the favicons to identify environments when logged into several at the same time.

ideas.name: Include a creation timestamp for API Keys

description.body: It would be helpful to see a timestamp of when an API key was created in XSOAR.
